pull.title: clang-tidy: Fix `modernize-use-default-member-init` in headers and force to check all headers
pull.body:
This PR:
- fixes the only [remained](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26705#issuecomment-1353742082) check in headers, i.e., `modernize-use-default-member-init`
- forces `clang-tidy` check all headers

Closes bitcoin/bitcoin#26703.

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ðŸ‘Ž to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#26812](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26812) (test: add end-to-end tests for CConnman and PeerManager by vasild)
* [#26312](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26312) (Remove Sock::Get() and Sock::Sock() by vasild)
* [#21878](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21878) (Make all networking code mockable by vasild)
* [#14485](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14485) (Try to use posix_fadvise with CBufferedFile by luke-jr)
* [#10443](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10443) (Add fee_est tool for debugging fee estimation code by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
concept ack, but it might be good to create one pull/commit for each bugfix. For example, it might be easier to review if there was a separate pull/commit to fix broken `std::move`.
Could this be done with a scripted-diff script using the clang-tidy -fix-errors command?

> concept ack, but it might be good to create one pull/commit for each bugfix.

Please review:
- [x] https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26707
- [x] https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26708
- [x] https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/685
- [x] https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26710
- [x] https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/686

Drafting this PR for now.

> it might be good to create one pull/commit for each bugfix.

The next one is https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26710 :)

> it might be easier to review if there was a separate pull/commit to fix broken `std::move`.

Please review #26707 first.

So this is only fixing `modernize-use-default-member-init`, and no other remaining checks?

Edit: Modulo https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26705#discussion_r1086340098

> So this is only fixing `modernize-use-default-member-init`, and no other remaining checks?
> 
> Edit: Modulo [#26705 (comment)](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26705#discussion_r1086340098)

That's true.

comments.body:
> #26965

Yeah, it would be nice if #26965 go first.
Any reason why nullptr isn't fixed as well?
Yeah, it has been overlooked. The `clang-tidy` does not complain, though.

I guess it refrains because there are multiple constructors: https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/blob/78f88082de3627ea04501c83a08f52cf1e60b4f7/clang-tools-extra/test/clang-tidy/checkers/modernize/use-default-member-init.cpp#L56
